ComicInfo.Title: Fred & Bob Get a Dog!; Delirius Chapter I; Where's the Attendant?; The Conclusion of Book One; Seeing Straight (Episode III); Huge Rodent; The Demon of the Eiffel Tower Chapter III
ComicInfo.Summary:
International flair with more of the finest comics from the word over! This issue features the continuation of The Demon of the Eiffel Tower- one of the Further Adventures of Adele Blanc-Sec- by Jaques Tardi, the return of Andreas with a hard-hitting story from the case files of Coutoo, and other exciting and humorous features by more of the world's finest comics creators.
Story TitlesThe Adventures of Fred & BobDelirius: The Further Adventures of Lone Sloane Chapter 1Where's The Attendant?Rork: The Conclusion of Book OneThe Eyeball Kid Episode 3: Seeing StraightHuge RodentThe Extraordinary Adventures of Adele Blanc-Sec: The Demon of the Eiffel Tower Chapter 3
